#summary links regarding the Globalsat GH615
#labels Featured

  * http://www.epplersoft.com/gpx/ Matthew Osburn and his crew created a page, which converts a [http://www.geocaching.com Geocaching.com] .loc file of waypoints to a waypoints.txt file format which can then directy be uploaded

  * http://code.google.com/p/gh615utils/ Utilities allowing GUI-access to tracks and waypoints as well as firmware editing tools which allow a translation of UI of the Watch to more languages (russian is downloadable)

  * [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks/ Sportracks] (Exercise software) now appears to have its own GH615 importer build in. See this [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks/Forums/viewtopic.php?p=14921#14921 Forum post]
